alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 7:47AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A cold front and squall will impact portions of southwestern Weld, western Arapahoe, Broomfield, southeastern Larimer, Denver, northeastern Jefferson, western Adams and eastern Boulder Counties through 830 AM MST... At 744 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a squall line extending from near Cedar Cove to Lakewood, or along a line extending Fort Collins to Denver. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and brief low visibility. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Denver, Fort Collins, Greeley, Aurora, Lakewood, Thornton, Arvada, Westminster, Centennial, Boulder, Longmont, Loveland, Broomfield, Commerce City, Littleton, Northglenn, Brighton, Englewood, Wheat Ridge and Lafayette. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
